post_title: You Are Entitled to a 96-Page Book - FREE from Organic Gardening!
post_text:
Free Book for Vegetable Garden Success!
Dear Friend:

If you dream of harvesting huge basketfuls of veggies — free of problems that plague other gardeners — then I have a book with your name on it! But you don't have to buy it...because you can have it free with your order!
Healthy Soil, Healthy Plants, Healthy Harvest is your one-stop answer book that'll give you predictably wonderful results season after season, year after year! Open up your FREE book and you'll see how to:

• Power up your garden soil! Discover the secrets of creating fast soil-enriching compost ... the potent compost tea recipe that helps turbocharge plant growth and prevent disease ... and clever mulching secrets to help solve your weeding woes forever.

• Prevent problems from cropping up! Discover the timing and planting secrets for garden success ... how to attract beneficial insects to thwart plant-ruining pests ... and much more.

• Stretch your garden season for MORE veggies! See how to jumpstart your garden by planting seeds inside ... protect early season plants with simple cover-ups ... and prolong your growing season with smart cold-frame secrets.

• Plant-by-plant secrets to the healthiest, tastiest veggies! For each of 20 common vegetable crops, you'll discover tips for planting, caring for, and harvesting at peak of flavor, plus ingenious secrets of success that help guarantee the best possible results!

Why am I going to send you this book for FREE?

Because I'd like to introduce you to ORGANIC GARDENING — the magazine that has been helping smart gardeners grow great crops without chemicals for almost 70 years!
Try ORGANIC GARDENING for 30 days and cancel if you decide not to continue.

Your big, colorful issue is overflowing with how-to tips for creating a yard with a "designed by a pro" look! From choosing the best flowers, shrubs, trees, fruits, and veggies to arranging them for spectacular effect, you'll see how to get great results without chemicals!

Plus, you'll get ingenious advice to safely control weeds and pests ... build super-fertile soil ... and grow and prepare a wide variety of vegetables at the peak of flavor.

Don't miss out on this exclusive double-FREE offer to enjoy a healthier, more beautiful garden with the best-tasting veggies you've ever eaten!

Happy Gardening!

JUICIER TOMATOES: Easy pruning secrets can increase yields and reduce disease problems. Page 61
Follow the simple growing secrets in your FREE book, and you'll enjoy the biggest, tastiest garden veggies you've ever grown! For example:
Sweeter lettuce: These smart tips will help lettuce cope with the heat.
Page 44

Faster potatoes: This simple preseason trick guarantees a quicker harvest! Page 55

Bigger broccoli: Heads can be 2 inches bigger when planted later!
Page 32

Just-right cucumbers: These signs show that your cukes are at juicy perfection and ready to pick. Page 41

Faster-growing melons: When they get baseball size, set them on the "throne"! Page 46

Perfect corn: Add a few drops of this (see page 31) to prevent earworm damage.

Excellent onions: The secret to success is how you prepare for planting! Page 48
And that's just a small taste of all the practical help you'll get in your FREE book!

post_title: Go from WALKING to RUNNING 30 minutes in only 30 days!
post_text:
Dear Friend,

Your best body ever starts now — with one easy (free) step.

Today, with a free look at our new breakthrough weight loss plan, you can take the first step of a simple, safe walking and running plan that can shed pounds faster and more easily than you ever thought possible.
Never thought of yourself as a runner? Neither did they. But after a few months walking and running with RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! here's what they found:
RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! is not a speed program. It is not an extreme training program for elite, rail-thin athletes. RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! is a simple, step-by-step fitness plan to help everyday folks start walking and add running in small, sensible increments. Now you can succeed at America's favorite outdoor sport without injury, even if you haven't run 20 yards in 20 years!

Little by little, week by week, you'll find yourself running more — and weighing less! You'll start by learning the basics:

Why you don't need to buy new running shoes to get started — and how to choose the right pair when it's time.

The most comfortable clothes to wear, from head to toe.

Quick ways to warm up and cool down.

The importance of running SLOWLY.

With your 21-Day Free-Trial copy of RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! you will find how to build on your early success with more challenging workouts as your stronger, leaner body takes shape. Week by week, you'll slowly work your way up from running 1 minute to running 30 minutes without pain or injury!

You'll also find easy fitness moves you can do at home to save time and money. No gym visits. No expensive equipment. These exercises can accelerate your muscle building and put you on the path to getting fit and staying fit.


Discover fast, easy-to-prepare snacks and meals that give you just the right amount of nutrition while you peel off the pounds. Within a few short weeks, you can begin to eat like a runner, have stamina like a runner — and look slim and sexy like a runner!

With RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! you stay in total control of your workout: You run at your own pace and for a distance you are comfortable with. You choose what's best for you. Make friends running or run alone on a treadmill. Rock out with music pumping in your earbuds or just enjoy the peaceful solitude of a few minutes alone with yourself. Run around your neighborhood or travel and join some of America's most popular outdoor running events.

Every page of RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! is infused with support and motivation from the editors of Runner's World to help new runners like you enjoy every step and succeed at your weight loss goals.

  With the revolutionary walk-to-run program in RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! from the editors of Runner's World, burning fat isn't the only benefit.

As you lose 10, 20, 30 pounds or more, you can also enjoy the "runner's high" that transforms your mood and energizes your life. You can get:

  
More energy and stamina than you've had in years!

A stronger, sexier
body and awakened sexual desire

Remarkable
calmness in stressful situations

Peace and quiet. No crowded gyms or
noisy dance studios!

Fresh air every morning, noon, or evening to fit your
busy schedule

The chance to meet new friends in running clubs and charity runs

  CLICK HERE NOW
FOR MORE DETAILS.

FREE GIFT!
NO PURCHASE NECESSARY
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS. There's nothing to buy now. But if you like what you see, you can sign up for a FREE 21-DAY TRIAL that can get you started with the slimming, toning, calming benefits of running!

Come along for the weight loss — and stay for the fun!

To your health!


Chris Cunningham
Runner's World Books
Whether you are a former athlete or never competed in athletics your whole life,
RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! will teach you step-by-step. You'll go at your own pace through a fun, safe walking and running plan designed for the new runner to lose weight and start a love of running! Click here for details and claim your 21-day free-trial copy. You'll also qualify for a free gift, just for looking!

post_title: Run Off 10, 20, 30 Pounds or More the Healthy Way  Beginners Welcome!
post_text:
Dear Friend,

Your best body ever starts now — with one easy (free) step.

Today, with a free look at our new breakthrough weight loss plan, you can take the first step of a simple, safe walking and running plan that can shed pounds faster and more easily than you ever thought possible.
Never thought of yourself as a runner? Neither did they. But after a few months walking and running with RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! here's what they found:
RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! is not a speed program. It is not an extreme training program for elite, rail-thin athletes. RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! is a simple, step-by-step fitness plan to help everyday folks start walking and add running in small, sensible increments. Now you can succeed at America's favorite outdoor sport without injury, even if you haven't run 20 yards in 20 years!

Little by little, week by week, you'll find yourself running more — and weighing less! You'll start by learning the basics:

Why you don't need to buy new running shoes to get started — and how to choose the right pair when it's time.

The most comfortable clothes to wear, from head to toe.

Quick ways to warm up and cool down.

The importance of running SLOWLY.

With your 21-Day Free-Trial copy of RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! you will find how to build on your early success with more challenging workouts as your stronger, leaner body takes shape. Week by week, you'll slowly work your way up from running 1 minute to running 30 minutes without pain or injury!

You'll also find easy fitness moves you can do at home to save time and money. No gym visits. No expensive equipment. These exercises can accelerate your muscle building and put you on the path to getting fit and staying fit.


  With the revolutionary walk-to-run program in RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! from the editors of Runner's World, burning fat isn't the only benefit.

As you lose 10, 20, 30 pounds or more, you can also enjoy the "runner's high" that transforms your mood and energizes your life. You can get:

  
More energy and stamina than you've had in years!
A stronger, sexier
body and awakened sexual desire
Remarkable
calmness in stressful situations
Discover fast, easy-to-prepare snacks and meals that give you just the right amount of nutrition while you peel off the pounds. Within a few short weeks, you can begin to eat like a runner, have stamina like a runner — and look slim and sexy like a runner!

With RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! you stay in total control of your workout: You run at your own pace and for a distance you are comfortable with. You choose what's best for you. Make friends running or run alone on a treadmill. Rock out with music pumping in your earbuds or just enjoy the peaceful solitude of a few minutes alone with yourself. Run around your neighborhood or travel and join some of America's most popular outdoor running events.

Every page of RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! is infused with support and motivation from the editors of Runner's World to help new runners like you enjoy every step and succeed at your weight loss goals.
Peace and quiet. No crowded gyms or
noisy dance studios!
Fresh air every morning, noon, or evening to fit your busy schedule
The chance to meet new friends in running clubs and charity runs
  CLICK HERE NOW
FOR MORE DETAILS.

FREE GIFT!
NO PURCHASE NECESSARY

CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS. There's nothing to buy now. But if you like what you see, you can sign up for a FREE 21-DAY TRIAL that can get you started with the slimming, toning, calming benefits of running!

Come along for the weight loss — and stay for the fun!

To your health!

Chris Cunningham
Runner's World Books
Whether you are a former athlete or never competed in athletics your whole life,
RUN YOUR BUTT OFF! will teach you step-by-step. You'll go at your own pace through a fun, safe walking and running plan designed for the new runner to lose weight and start a love of running!
